priority_alerts.title: DPDP Rules 2025 Notified
priority_alerts.summary: Digital Personal Data Protection Rules notified with phased implementation through May 2027. Stage 1 effective immediately.
priority_alerts.action_required: Review full rules, assess compliance timelines for clients

priority_alerts.title: IT Amendment Rules 2025 - Deepfakes
priority_alerts.summary: New rules for synthetic content labeling, enhanced content removal safeguards, intermediary oversight strengthened.

priority_alerts.title: MeitY vs X/Grok Enforcement
priority_alerts.summary: MeitY finds X response inadequate on Grok AI generating non-consensual imagery. Active enforcement action.
priority_alerts.action_required: Monitor for precedent on AI platform liability

findings.title: WhatsApp Tests Parental Controls With Child Accounts on Android
findings.summary: WhatsApp developing parental control features for child-linked accounts. Relevant to DPDP children's data protection.

findings.title: CCI Defends Global Turnover Penalties in Apple Antitrust Case
findings.summary: CCI defending global turnover-based penalty methodology. Precedent for digital markets enforcement.

findings.title: MeitY Finds X's Report on Grok 'Undressing' Images Inadequate
findings.summary: Active enforcement action on AI-generated non-consensual imagery under intermediary liability framework.

findings.title: Kentucky AG Files Lawsuit Against Character.AI
findings.summary: First US state lawsuit against AI chatbot company for child safety. Comparative relevance for India.

findings.title: US Withdrawal From Global Digital Forums
findings.summary: US withdrawal shifts norm-setting power, strategic implications for India's digital governance stance.

findings.title: Prior Restraint and Compelled Speech in IT Rules 2025 Draft
findings.summary: Constitutional analysis of mandatory content verification under Article 19.

findings.title: The Sahyog Regime: Architecture of Digital Control
findings.summary: Analysis of government content takedown procedures under Section 79(3)(b).

findings.title: DPIIT Blanket Licensing for AI Training
findings.summary: Critique of India's proposed licensing framework for AI training, copyright implications.

findings.title: DHC Domain Name Regulation - Ex Ante Approach
findings.summary: Delhi HC's sweeping directives on domain registration raising privacy and speech concerns.

findings.title: TRAI Recommendations on Foreign SIM/eSIM for IoT Exports
findings.summary: New regulatory framework for foreign telecom providers selling SIM/eSIM for M2M/IoT export devices.

findings.title: DPDP Rules 2025 Notified
findings.summary: Digital Personal Data Protection Rules notified. Phased implementation through May 2027.

findings.title: IT Amendment Rules 2025 - Deepfakes & Content Removal
findings.summary: New rules for synthetic content labeling, enhanced content removal safeguards.

notes: Full intelligence gathering run completed successfully. Major developments: DPDP Rules 2025 and IT Amendment Rules 2025 are now in effect.
